law.text: All records of the commission, including those maintained by the department for its account, shall be public records. All persons holding any license which is authorized by this chapter, as of June 16, 1966, shall have the right to continue to hold, maintain, and renew such license after June 16, 1966, subject only to the suspension or revocation thereof pursuant to the provisions of this chapter.
law.history: Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 374, sec. 10, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 175, sec. 11.
